function_description: Add a new card to a list
initial_state: The user is logged into the 4ga Boards application and is viewing a board with at least one list present.
steps: Locate the 'Add new card' button within a list.
Fill in the necessary details for the card, such as title and labels.
Confirm the addition of the new card.
expected_state: A new card is added to the selected list, displaying the entered title and any additional details like labels or due dates.
